tool_description: Convert and parse data. Encoding and decoding hex, ascii, and base64. More features coming soon
name: Code Butler
title: Code Butler

api_list.name: api
api_list.description:
the main endpoint of code-butler
Use this to encode, decode, and convert text to another object type

required_parameters.name: Function
required_parameters.description:
Changing the function, changes what the api does.
Valid options include:
    ConvertTo-Bytes
    Parse-Bool
    Parse-Int
    Parse-Float
    EncodeAs-Base64
    DecodeAs-Base64
    EncodeAs-Hex
    DecodeAs-Hex
